content.rendered:
Frozen Passion Fruit half cut is a product made from fresh passion fruit, they are frozen, vacuum packed and sold in many countries that cannot be grown.

Passion fruit becomes a popular beverage, it is not only fragrant, cool but also nutritious, they have good benefits to the human body

The process of Frozen Passion Fruit half cut

Fresh passion fruit are delivered to the factory, where workers pick up ripe passion fruit that are purple and have the size that meets the customer’s requirements.

The passion fruit whole are washed several times with clean water, the washing process takes carefully to ensure their crust are not scratched

The fresh passion fruit are frozen at a negative temperature of 40-35 degrees celsius, they are cut in half and vacuum packed in plastic bag

Frozen passion fruit half cut are vacuum packed in plastic bag with a weight of 500g
